items.sentence: It\'s likely to take more than a week to finish doing this.
Tom asked Mary where she lived, but she wouldn\'t tell him.
Tom asked a lot of questions I didn\'t know the answers to.
When was the last time you and Tom went to Boston together?
Who was your favorite teacher when you were in high school?
Tom and Mary have always gotten along well with each other.
Tom and Mary participated in the cultural exchange program.
I knew things about Tom that even his parents didn\'t know.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve done anything like that.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve written anyone a letter.
